summary.span: 提供可视三维对象通用的服务和属性，其中包括命中测试、坐标转换和边界框计算。

span.span: Provides services and properties that are common to visual 3-D objects, including hit-testing, coordinate transformation, and bounding box calculations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同类，对象不能共享或重复使用。Unlike the class, objects cannot be shared or reused. 访问服务上使用静态方法类。Access services by using static methods on the class. 对象优化为场景节点。 objects are optimized to be scene nodes. 例如，它们缓存边界。For example, they cache bounds. 每当您可以使用您的场景中的对象的唯一实例的对象。Whenever you can, use objects for unique instances of objects within your scene. 这种用法与对比优化可共享和重复使用的轻量对象的对象。This usage contrasts with that of objects, which are lightweight objects that are optimized to be shared and reused. 例如，使用对象来生成一辆汽车; 一个模型，并使用 10对象将十个汽车放置在您的场景。For example, use a object to build a model of a car; and use ten objects to place ten cars in your scene.

span.para: 从派生的类必须调用此方法以通知新的子级出现的 children 集合中的层。层然后调用方法。
A class that derives from must call this method to notify the layer that a new child appeared in the children collection. The layer then calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换投影到二维空间的三维点。This transform projects a 3-D point to a 2-D space. 所产生的点是上级的指定的坐标空间中的已转换三维点。The resulting point is the transformed 3-D point in the coordinate space of the specified ancestor. 方法在.NET Framework 版本 3.5 中引入。The method is introduced in .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 指定的 对象不是此对象的上级。

span.span: The specified object is not an ancestor of this object.

member this.Visual3DChildrenCount : int

summary.span: 获取 对象的子元素数量。

span.span: Gets the number of child elements for the object.
The number of child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不包含任何子元素。By default, a has no child elements. 因此，默认实现始终返回 0。Therefore, the default implementation always returns 0. 属性在.NET Framework 版本 3.5 中引入。The property is introduced in .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.para: 若要正确地枚举可视化树，派生的类必须重写此属性并同时重写方法。
To correctly enumerate the visual tree, a class that derives from must override this property and also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在.NET Framework 版本 3.5 中引入。The property is introduced in .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
